movies.title: Initiation mortelle
movies.plot: Everyday Megan Harris wakes from the same horrific dream about a pledge dying in a hazing ritual only to have her memory wiped clean. Determined to kick her Anterograde Amnesia and discover what happened to the girl who haunts her dreams, Megan joins her former sisters at a Greek-wide reunion. Her head reels as jealousies and misplaced loyalties begin to simmer, sending her on a downward spiral that has her wondering whether she can even trust herself... Megan fights for her life and battles time to find the truth before her memory is erased again.
movies.simplePlot: Every night Megan has the same dream, of a party and the death of a sister, but when she's invited to a Greek reunion, she realizes there maybe more to her dream.

biography.bio: Shenae Grimes-Beech was born on October 24, 1989 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada as Shenae Sonya Grimes. She is known for her work on 90210 (2008), Scream 4 (2011) and Degrassi: la nouvelle génération (2001). She has been married to Josh Beech since May 10, 2013.
biography.name: Shenae Grimes-Beech

biography.bio: Keegan Allen received his breakout role in ABC Family's hit series "Pretty Little Liars", based on the novels by Sara Shepard He portrayed the mysterious "Black Cat" character Toby Cavanaugh. Allen has also made small appearances in TV shows such as Nickelodeon's "Big Time Rush" and "CSI: Crime Scene Investigation".
biography.name: Keegan Allen

biography.bio: Amanda Thomson is known for her work on Initiation mortelle (2014), Le concours de Noël (2012) and Loraine (2013).
biography.name: Amanda Thomson

biography.bio: Brett is an actor best known for his roles as Luke Matheson on Ravenswood and Pretty Little Liars. Currently playing Michael Cordero on Jane the Virgin (2014-?). Brett is quite versatile, plays the piano, guitar, fluent in french, break dances and practices Parkour. Has his first degree black belt in Tae Kwon Do.
biography.name: Brett Dier

biography.bio: Megan Hutchings is an actress, known for Reign (2013) and The L.A. Complex (2012).
biography.name: Megan Hutchings

biography.bio: Kaitlyn is an actor for film and television with a degree from York University in Psychology. Kaitlyn first started out in the industry as a print model in ad campaigns and billboards for companies such as Virgin Mobile, Dentyne Ice, FUZE fruit drinks, and RBC for the 2010 TIFF before starting her career as an actress.
biography.name: Kaitlyn Leeb

biography.bio: Sidney Leeder is an actress and producer, known for Goon (2011), Spaceship (2014) and Initiation mortelle (2014).
biography.name: Sidney Leeder

biography.bio: Nicholas Yunge-Bateman was Born in Burlington Ontario Canada. He started Karate at Age 4 in Hopes to become a Ninja Turtle. Since then Nick has won 4 Martial Arts World Titles. Nick graduated from Capilano University in Vancouver BC at age 20 and opened his own Karate School for 3 years, He then decided to close it to pursue his passion for acting. He landed his first major role Starring alongside Rutger Hauer and Gregory Smith in Hobo With a Shotgun. Nick is Also known for his International Model work with Abercrombie & Fitch, Dsquared, Fila, Jockey, Calvin Klein and etc.
biography.name: Nick Bateman
